metadata.name: Punk of Color #1
metadata.description:
Punks of Color is a collection of 10,000 unique algorithmically generated avatars. A spin on the Larva Labs project "CryptoPunks", Punks of Color use improved art and typical African features.
We want Punks of Color to be a celebration; a celebration of the diversity and creativity that is ever so present within the black community.
Every Punk of Color is generated using 100+ traits of varying rarity. Punks of Color are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and the artwork is hosted on IPFS.
